Name: Home Slice Pizza
Description: Home Slice Pizza is an independent neighborhood pizza joint serving authentic NY style pizza - by the pie or by the slice - to nice peple like you. We offer our homemade, hand tossed, bona fide pies for either dine in or carry out.

Name: Joe's Coffee
Description: Stumptown coffee, baked goods & sandwiches in colorful digs with outdoor area for people-watching.
